error.signature: Error: Dynamic server usage: cookies/headers() used in a page that will be statically generated

verdict.summary: Using cookies()/headers() makes the page dynamic, conflicting with static generation.

dead_ends.why_fails: May break auth or personalization features

workarounds.action: Add export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic' to opt into dynamic rendering
Move cookie/header access to middleware or API routes if possible

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' is a rendering_error error while 'API Route body not parsed / req.body is undefined' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
